info.author: den_RDC
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
info.description:
The guide provider: http://www.teveblad.be

This is a rewrite of xml_tv_be.py wich was originally made by
me (den_RDC) and Bart Heremans and included in the
freevo cvs tree.
This new version uses the customizedparser written by gustavo,
and is therefore somewhat similar to tv_grav_br_uol.
This design is also double threaded, there is a thread per
channel and a defined number of worker threads that handle
program information.

This grabber currently provides the following xmltv elements
channel
progamme (with name, start & stop time)
extra info (if available for a particular programme)
    desc
    sub-title (eg episode titel)
    country (of origin)
    episode-num
    category
more info will be implemented when xmltv 0.6 finalizes
info.keywords: python xmltv grabber be Belgium (flanders)/The Netherlands
info.name: pytvgrab-be_tvb
info.summary: python xmltv grabber for Belgium (flanders)/The Netherlands (source - http://www.teveblad.be)
